name: End Of Skeleton
description:
Who knew necromancy would be so complicated?

You always assumed raising the dead would be the most difficult part. Yet here you are, with your own freshly reanimated revenant, trying to get it to perform a simple task, to absolutely no avail.

As it turns out, skeletons don’t have much in matters of brain. "Walk over there and find the chest" is too complicated for them. They can only process very short instructions, that you’ll have to write in a specific order to achieve a specific result. Kind of like a…

…like a…

…well, there’s probably a good analogy somewhere, but this is a fantasy world.

--------------------------------

Made during the Womxn Develop at Ubisoft  2021 program.
